page.title: 01AN OVERVIEW
page.content: THE AREA AROUND{ITCHINGFIELD, CHRIST'S {HOSPITAL,BARNS GREEN AND SOUTHWATER}IS MAINLY FARM LAND WITH NARROW WINDING LANES.THERE IS A RAILWAY THAT RUNS THROUGH BARNS GREEN AND CHRIST'S HOSPITAL AND A DISUSED RAILWAY THAT RUNS THROUGH SOUTHWATER.ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF THE AREA THERE ARE DUAL CARRIAGEWAYS BYPASSING HORSHAM AND SOUTHWATER.THERE ARE MANY AGRICULTURAL FARMS BUT A FEW DEAL IN STOCK.THERE ARE NEW HOUSES BEING BUILT AROUND THE SOUTHWATER AREA AND PLANNING PERMISSION HAS BEEN APPLIED FOR 6000 MORE HOUSES.THERE IS A DISPUTE AS THE ESTATE WOULD BE BUILT ON PEOPLES LAND.THERE ARE MANY AREAS OF WOODLAND WITH BRIDLE WAYS AND FOOTPATHS RUNNING THROUGH.MANY RIVERS,STREAMS AND PONDS RUN THROUGH THE AREA.THE LAND IS FAIRLY HILLY WITH SHARPENHURST BEING THE HIGHEST POINT.
